displayBio.en: Yin Xiuzhen (born 1963, Beijing) graduated from the Oil Painting Department of Capital Normal University, Beijing, in 1989. Her work explores globalisation and urbanisation. Yin lives and works in Beijing.
displayBio.zh-hant: 尹秀珍 (1963年生於北京，現工作及生活於北京) 1989年畢業於北京首都師範大學美術學院油畫系，作品探討全球化及都市化等現代議題。
